thread.title: Manchester United fan sings "20 Times" chant in Vincent Kompany's face - Man City star gets the last laugh
thread.title_full: Manchester United fan sings "20 Times" chant in Vincent Kompany's face - Man City star gets the last laugh

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Manchester United fan sings "20 Times" chant in Vincent Kompany's face - Man City star gets the last laugh
text:
Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A daring Manchester United fan decided to prank Manchester City's Vincent Kompany recently by singing a famous Red Devils chant... in his face. 
The gutsy United supporter put his arm around the unsuspecting centre-back as he appeared to be leaving from an event. 
Judging by Kompany's reaction, the Belgium international assumed his new friend was simply wanting a picture. 
But the 30-year-old soon clocks on when the United supporter starts singing "20 times Man United". 
Here are the words in case you didn't know: Vincent Kompany was not impressed (Photo: Twitter/MufcSongs) 
"20 times 20ï»¿ times Man United, "20 times 20 times I say, "20 times 20 times Man United, "Playing Football The Matt Busby Way!" City won the Premier League more recently than United (Photo: Getty) 
But instead of making a quick exit, Kompany decides to get his own back. The Man City star responds: "When was the last time?" 
Of course, the Sky Blues last won the Premier League in 2013/14, one year after bitter rivals Man United last finished first in the competition. Like us on Facebook
